text: A Vanished World is a 1922 Austrian adventure movie directed by Alexander Korda and based on the novel by Lajos Bíró. It stars Alberto Capozzi, Victor Varconi, María Corda, Tibor Lubinszky, Gyula Szőreghy. ==Other websites== * Category:1922 adventure movies Category:Austrian adventure movies Category:Austrian silent movies Category:Movies directed by Alexander Korda Category:Movies based on books
title: A Vanished World
